title: Smriti Mandhana wedding postponed: Has Palash Muchhal also deleted Instagram posts?
description: Indian cricketer Smriti Mandhana and composer Palash Muchhal's November 23 wedding has been postponed due to unexpected family health emergencies. Mandhana's father and groom-to-be Muchhal were hospitalized, leading to the decision. Both are now recovering, but a new date is yet to be announced. Friend Jemimah Rodrigues has withdrawn from WBBL to support Mandhana.

title: Nishant Agarwal to walk free in BrahMos spy case; Pak’s ‘Neha’, ‘Pooja’ targeted more scientists
description: A former BrahMos Aerospace scientist, Nishant Agarwal, has been cleared of espionage and cyber terrorism charges by the Bombay High Court. While exonerated of passing missile secrets, he was convicted for possessing classified information on a personal device, receiving a three-year sentence. Having already served longer, his release is anticipated.

title: Govt orders handset makers to preload its Sanchar Saathi app
description: Smartphone manufacturers must now pre-install the government's Sanchar Saathi app on all devices sold in India. This mandate, effective within 90 days, aims to bolster cyber security and prevent IMEI tampering. However, privacy advocates express strong concerns, viewing it as an invasion of personal space and a potential threat to user data.

title: ‘Don’t want a slave’s peace’: Maduro hits back at Trump's 'leave Venezuela' threat; tensions escalate
description: Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro rejected a "slave's peace" amid escalating US pressure, accusing Washington of testing the nation with a prolonged naval deployment.  Reports suggest President Trump issued an ultimatum for Maduro to step down, which was reportedly refused. The US has intensified military pressure in the Caribbean, with strikes targeting suspected drug-carrying boats.

description: Ford CEO Jim Farley warns of a critical US trade worker shortage, leaving 1 million jobs unfilled. He highlights a dangerous gap compared to China in building essential workforces, impacting national security. Farley advocates for rebuilding the blue-collar pipeline through education and cultural respect, citing Ford's recent union agreements as a step towards career stability for workers.

title: ‘Waah India Post!’ Video of parcels being thrown on railway tracks in UP sparks outrage
description: Shocking visuals emerged from Pratapgarh Railway Station showing India Post workers tossing mail bags onto tracks. The incident, captured on video, sparked widespread outrage online. India Post has acknowledged the mishandling and initiated action against the involved personnel and supervisors. They have also requested the railways for a ramp to ensure proper mail movement.

title: Drake Maye readies for Giants as wife Ann’s viral gym photo stuns Patriots fans
description: New England Patriots quarterback Drake Maye is electrifying fans with his stellar performance, leading the team to a dominant 10-2 record. Off the field, his wife, Ann Michael Maye, is gaining a significant following on TikTok for her fitness and lifestyle content. Their combined popularity makes them a notable NFL power couple.

title: Cardi B and Stefon Diggs look in love while celebrating his birthday on Instagram
description: Cardi B delighted fans by sharing glimpses of Stefon Diggs' birthday. A custom Snoopy football cake, celebrating his jersey number, stole the show. Later, a video captured the couple joyfully rapping and dancing in a car, radiating pure, unadulterated fun. This intimate peek into their celebration resonated deeply, earning them 'relationship goals' praise.

title: Leon Draisaitl’s sharp message puts fresh spotlight on Connor McDavid’s leadership
description: Leon Draisaitl responded with 'Lol' to criticism about Edmonton Oilers' leadership.  The podcast suggested top players like Draisaitl and Connor McDavid should provide more direction.  Despite past Stanley Cup Final appearances, the Oilers face defensive struggles this season.  Their offense remains strong with McDavid and Draisaitl.  Fans are divided on the criticism.  The team's on-ice performance will ultimately show leadership.

title: Gmail hack: Declutter your Google storage; how to keep your inbox running smoothly
description: Running out of Gmail storage? Don't panic! This guide reveals how to quickly free up space by clearing trash, deleting large attachments, and managing newsletters. Learn to use Google's Storage Manager to declutter across Drive and Photos, ensuring smooth performance and avoiding costly upgrades. Maintain a clean inbox with simple, regular habits.
